text: College of the Holy Cross is a Jesuit university in Worcester, Massachusetts. It was founded in 1843. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Official Athletics website *Unofficial Athletics website *The Advocate *The Crusader Category:Colleges and universities in Massachusetts Category:1843 establishments in the United States Category:Patriot League Category:Worcester, Massachusetts Category:1840s establishments in Massachusetts
title: College of the Holy Cross
